items.title: MacBook、Apple Watch、iPad等产品的最佳黑色星期五早期苹果优惠 (原标题: The Best Early Black Friday Apple Deals on MacBook, Apple Watch, iPad, and More)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
本文介绍了2025年黑色星期五（11月28日）前夕，苹果产品在亚马逊等平台上的早期优惠，重点关注历史最低价或接近历史最低价的折扣。

## 主要亮点

*   **优惠时间**：黑色星期五临近，文章分享了当前可用的最佳早期优惠。
*   **主要销售平台**：大部分折扣可在亚马逊上找到，部分MacBook Pro优惠在Expercom。
*   **价格策略**：所有列出的产品均达到历史最低价或非常接近历史最低价。
*   **联盟伙伴声明**：MacRumors是部分供应商的联盟伙伴，通过链接购买可能获得佣金。

## 精选推荐

以下是文章中列出的部分顶级优惠：

*   **AirTag四件装**：$64.99（优惠$34）
*   **Apple Watch SE 3**：$199.99（优惠$50）
*   **Apple Watch Ultra 3**：$699.99（优惠$99）
*   **13英寸MacBook Air**：$749.99（优惠$249）
*   **14英寸M5 MacBook Pro**：$1,487.07（优惠$113）

![图片 1](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/10/Early-Black-Friday-Deals-1.jpg)

## 详细优惠信息

### M5 MacBook Pro

*   **独家折扣**：Expercom提供高达$234的折扣，这是M5 MacBook Pro迄今为止的最低价。
*   **配置示例**：
    *   512GB 14英寸M5 MacBook Pro：$1,487.07（原价$1,599.00）
    *   10核M5, 16GB RAM, 512GB：$1,487.07（原价$1,599.00）
    *   10核M5, 16GB RAM, 1TB：$1,673.07（原价$1,799.00）
    *   还提供高达32GB RAM、4TB存储和Nano-Texture显示屏的定制配置。
*   **购买提示**：在Safari浏览器中点击链接可能无法显示折扣价，建议在新标签页打开或使用Chrome、Firefox等浏览器。

![图片 2](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m5-macbook-pro-holiday-green.jpeg)

### Apple Watch

*   **Series 11**：46毫米天然钛金属型号$711.00（优惠$88）。
*   **Ultra 3**：部分型号优惠$99，如黑色钛金属（海洋表带）$699.99。
*   **SE 3**：首次大幅折扣，40毫米GPS型号$199.99（优惠$49）。
*   **SE 2**：历史最低价，40毫米GPS型号$159.99（优惠$89）。
*   **Series 10**：部分型号优惠$119，如42毫米GPS型号$279.99。

![图片 3](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/apple-watch-se-3-new-green.jpeg)

### iPad (第11代)

*   亚马逊提供Wi-Fi型号$50折扣。
*   128GB Wi-Fi iPad：$299.00（原价$349.00）。
*   256GB Wi-Fi iPad：$399.00；512GB Wi-Fi iPad：$599.00。

![图片 4](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/ipad-holiday-green.jpeg)

### iPad mini (第7代)

*   Wi-Fi型号价格低廉，128GB Wi-Fi型号$399.00（优惠$100）。
*   蜂窝网络型号也有优惠。

![图片 5](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/ipad-mini-green-holiday.jpeg)

### M5 iPad Pro

*   亚马逊首次提供显著折扣。
*   11英寸M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi)：$943.00（优惠$57）。
*   13英寸M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi)：$1,246.00（优惠$54）；13英寸M5 iPad Pro (2TB Wi-Fi Nano-Texture)：$2,298.00（优惠$101）。

![图片 6](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m5-ipad-pro-holiday-green.jpeg)

### M4 MacBook Air

*   13英寸M4 MacBook Air (256GB)：$749.99（优惠$249），创历史新低。
*   13英寸和15英寸M4 MacBook Air的512GB型号也有优惠。

![图片 7](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m4-macbook-air-green-.jpeg)

### Apple Pencil

*   Apple Pencil Pro：$99.00（优惠$30）。

![图片 8](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/apple-pencil-pro-green.jpeg)

### AirTag

*   四件装：$64.99（优惠$34），与历史最低价持平。
*   单件装：$24.00，未达到历史最低价，建议考虑四件装或等待。

![图片 9](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/airtag-green-holiday.jpeg)

### iPhone 17 保护壳

*   亚马逊对iPhone 17和iPhone Air系列的透明、硅胶和TechWoven保护壳提供大幅折扣。
*   例如，iPhone 17透明保护壳$39.99（原价$49.00）。

![图片 10](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/iphone-17-case-holiday.jpeg)

### Mac Mini

*   M4 Mac mini (256GB)：$499.00（优惠$100）。
*   M4 Mac mini (512GB)：$689.99（优惠$109）。

![图片 11](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m4-mac-mini-holiday.jpeg)

## 总结

文章鼓励读者关注MacRumors的黑色星期五汇总，以获取最新的苹果产品折扣信息。

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with some of these vendors. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

items.title: 头条新闻：iOS 26.1 发布，iOS 26.2 Beta，iPhone 18 传闻等 (原标题: Top Stories: iOS 26.1 Released, iOS 26.2 Beta, iPhone 18 Rumors, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
本周，苹果在软件和硬件方面均有重要动态，包括 iOS 26.1 的公开发布、iOS 26.2 Beta 的启动以及对未来产品线的展望。

## 本周苹果动态概览

*   **软件方面**：iOS 26.1 正式发布，紧随其后的是 iOS 26.2 的测试版，预示着更多功能更新。
*   **硬件方面**：2026年有望成为苹果的重要一年，预计将有几乎所有产品线的更新以及一些新产品推出。

![top stories 2025 11 08](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TOhLQYJT_Ljb19lZXZ_2tdG6nKk=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/top-stories-2025-11-08.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26.1 新功能

在 iOS 26、macOS Tahoe 等主要操作系统发布约六周后，苹果推出了首个重要后续更新 iOS 26.1，主要新功能包括：

*   新增 Liquid Glass 透明度调节开关。
*   新增选项可关闭锁屏滑动访问相机的手势。
*   闹钟和计时器在锁屏上新增“滑动停止”按钮，以减少意外关闭。
*   新增 Apple Intelligence 语言支持。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26.2 Beta 1 新功能

iOS 26.1 发布后，苹果几乎立即推出了 iOS 26.2 的首个开发者测试版，预计将于12月发布正式版。目前已发现的改动包括：

*   锁屏时钟的 Liquid Glass 滑块。
*   睡眠评分功能更新。
*   为提醒事项设置闹钟的功能。
*   **针对欧盟用户**：更新后 AirPods 将支持实时翻译，但会失去 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 之间的自动 Wi-Fi 网络同步功能。

![ios 26 2 whats new](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VuJIxfg7pkth6v1WmNXqUmTuNic=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/ios-26-2-whats-new.jpg?lossy)

## 2026年苹果新产品展望

据彭博社 Mark Gurman 报告，苹果计划在2026年发布至少15款新产品，可能包括对智能家居平台的重大改造。Apple TV 和 HomePod mini 可能在2025年底前获得更新，但新的 Mac 产品预计要等到2026年。

![Apple Logo Spotlight](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-ExMtbhwKwtSkj33nseqBNpPVP0=/400x0/article-new/2023/09/Apple-Logo-Spotlight.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 18 Pro 潜在新颜色

有爆料者称，iPhone 18 Pro 机型可能推出一种新的浓郁暖色调。微博用户“Instant Digital”透露，潜在颜色选项包括咖啡色、紫色或勃艮第色。苹果目前仍在决策阶段，最终只会选择其中一种进行生产。

![Coffee Burgundy and Purple iPhone 18 Pro Mock](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TdSd_I5TEQXGK2ndQhHj1KAAoHA=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/Coffee-Burgundy-and-Purple-iPhone-18-Pro-Mock.jpg?lossy)

## 新版 Siri 将集成 Google Gemini

据报道，预计明年3月或4月推出的更强大版 Siri 将利用定制版 Google Gemini。苹果每年将向 Google 支付约10亿美元，以获取一个1.2万亿参数的 AI 模型来驱动 Siri，以提升其 AI 能力。

![Apple Intelligence General Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-d_V1_ldUVFarK7gecXm6-oH_Ak=/400x0/article-new/2024/06/Apple-Intelligence-General-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 黑色星期五早期苹果优惠

11月已至，假日购物季和黑色星期五促销活动即将开始。MacRumors 正在关注最佳早期苹果产品优惠，百思买、塔吉特和三星等零售商已公布早期销售计划。

![Early Black Friday Deals 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FqauIXds6McnYOcW0stIi3DWNFM=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Early-Black-Friday-Deals-2.jpg?lossy)

## 其他热门新闻

*   **苹果调整折抵换购价值**：iPhone、iPad、Mac 等设备的最高折抵价值多数下降或不变，但 iPad Air 略有上涨。
*   **苹果分享 Liquid Glass 设计画廊**：推广 iOS 26 中的 Liquid Glass 设计，展示第三方开发者如何应用该美学。
*   **AirTag 四件装惊人低价**：苹果美国官网曾以单个 AirTag 的价格（29美元）出售四件装，可能为定价错误。
*   **宜家推出21款 HomeKit 兼容智能家居产品**：包括传感器、灯具和控制选项，均支持 Matter 协议。
*   **苹果电视新片头采用实景特效**：新的 Apple TV 片头序列通过拍摄大型玻璃版 Apple TV 标志，结合物理运动和灯光变化制作而成。
items.shortSummary: 本周苹果发布了 iOS 26.1，新增 Liquid Glass 调整、相机手势关闭等功能，并迅速推出 iOS 26.2 Beta。2026年，苹果预计将发布至少15款新产品，包括智能家居平台更新。iPhone 18 Pro 传闻将有新颜色，而新版 Siri 将整合 Google Gemini。此外，苹果调整了设备折抵价值，并启动了黑色星期五早期优惠。欧盟地区 iOS 26.2 将移除 iPhone-Apple Watch Wi-Fi 同步功能。

items.content:
Things were busy in Apple software land this week, with the public release of iOS 26.1 and updates for Apple's other platforms being quickly followed by the round of 26.2 betas with plenty more changes in store.


On the hardware side, we're still wondering whether we'll see anything more released before the end of the year, but either way, 2026 is shaping up to be a big year for Apple with updates across almost the entire lineup and likely some new entrants as well.

Top Stories


Everything New in iOS 26.1


Some six weeks after the initial release of iOS 26, macOS Tahoe, and other major operating system updates, Apple this week released the first significant follow-on updates with the 26.1 versions.


iOS 26.1 adds a new toggle to adjust the transparency of Liquid Glass, an option to turn off the Lock Screen swipe gesture to access the Camera, a new "slide to stop" button on the Lock Screen for alarms and timers to reduce accidental dismissals, new Apple Intelligence language support, and more.

Everything New in iOS 26.2 Beta 1


As is frequently the case, the public release of iOS 26.1 was almost immediately followed by the first developer beta of iOS 26.2 as Apple begins testing the next update ahead of an expected December release.


Changes discovered in the first beta so far include a Liquid Glass slider for the Lock Screen clock, updates to the Sleep Score feature, the ability to set alarms for reminders, and more. EU users will get access to Live Translation on AirPods with the update, though they will lose automatic Wi-Fi network syncing between iPhone and Apple Watch.

Report: Apple to Launch These New Products in 2026


Apple is gearing up to release at least 15 new products in 2026, according to a new recap from Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, and it is likely to include a long-awaited revamp of the company's smart home platform.


It's possible we could even get a few more updates to products like the Apple TV and HomePod mini before the end of 2025, but if you're waiting for additional new Macs, you're almost certainly going to need to wait until next year.

Leaker Outlines Potential New Colors for iPhone 18 Pro


Apple's iPhone 18 Pro models could be available in a new rich and warm color option, according to a known leaker.


The Weibo user known as "Instant Digital" has claimed that next-year's ‌iPhone 18‌ Pro models will be available in one of the following color options: coffee, purple, or burgundy. Despite some initial media confusion thinking Apple might release all three of the rumored colors, the leaker later clarified that Apple is currently still in the decision phase will only move forward with production on one of them.

New Version of Siri to 'Lean' on Google Gemini


The new, more powerful version of Siri reportedly coming around March or April of next year will apparently leverage a custom version of Google Gemini as Apple continues to try to catch up to the competition with its own AI capabilities.

items.title: 苹果廉价MacBook：2026年展望 (原标题: Apple's Cheap MacBook: What to Expect in 2026)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果廉价MacBook：2026年展望

苹果计划于2026年推出一款低成本MacBook，旨在以低于999美元MacBook Air的价格，更好地与廉价Chromebook和Windows PC竞争。这款经济型笔记本电脑将为需要处理文档编辑、网页浏览、观看视频和完成作业等轻量级任务的用户提供一个新选择。

![A18 Pro MacBook Thumb](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7LEaBXv7EVbAzefyBDXCoItGJhg=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/A18-Pro-MacBook-Thumb.jpg?lossy)

### 关键信息点：

*   **发布时间：** 预计在2026年上半年推出，可能与MacBook Air的更新同步。

*   **尺寸与设计：**
    *   **显示屏：** 苹果分析师郭明錤预测，这款低成本MacBook将配备约13英寸的显示屏，略小于13.6英寸的MacBook Air。
    *   **显示技术：** 将采用标准LCD显示屏，不具备mini-LED技术或ProMotion刷新率。
    *   **颜色：** 可能会像iMac一样提供鲜艳的颜色，郭明錤建议可能包括银色、蓝色、粉色和黄色。
    *   **厚度：** 考虑到其低价定位，苹果可能不会优先考虑超薄设计，但预计不会比0.44英寸厚的MacBook Air更厚。

*   **核心芯片：A18 Pro**
    *   **来源：** 苹果计划在这款MacBook中使用A18 Pro芯片，该芯片首次亮相于iPhone 16 Pro型号。
    *   **工艺与内存：** 采用苹果第二代3纳米工艺制造，配备8GB RAM。
    *   **Apple Intelligence支持：** 将支持Apple Intelligence功能。
    *   **性能：** A18 Pro芯片快速高效，足以处理日常任务。在Geekbench 6基准测试中，其单核CPU性能与M3 Ultra相当，多核性能高于初代Apple Silicon MacBook Air中使用的M1芯片。GPU（Metal分数）也与M1芯片相似。对于某些任务，A18 Pro将与M1相当，而对于其他任务则更快。

*   **功能与用途：**
    *   **广泛兼容性：** 凭借A18 Pro芯片，这款低成本MacBook将能够完成iPhone 16 Pro所能做的任何事情。
    *   **替代方案：** 它将是低成本iPad搭配键盘的合适替代品，并运行macOS而非iPadOS。
    *   **日常任务：** 网页浏览、视频观看、文档创建、照片编辑甚至轻度视频编辑都不成问题。
    *   **游戏：** 可以玩所有苹果iPad和iPhone游戏，包括Apple Arcade游戏，但不适合运行高端系统密集型游戏。
    *   **专业应用：** 可以运行Final Cut Pro等应用程序，但视频导出速度不会像更强大的Mac那样快。

*   **接口与电池续航：**
    *   **接口：** 苹果可能不会提供大量端口，预计可能只有一个USB-C端口，但也可能像MacBook Air一样提供两个。
    *   **电池续航：** A18 Pro芯片高效，13英寸机身内部有充足空间容纳电池，因此续航时间有望达到或超过MacBook Air的水平（视频播放长达18小时，网页浏览15小时）。

*   **价格预测：**
    *   **低于1000美元：** 彭博社称其价格将“远低于1000美元”，以低于999美元的MacBook Air。
    *   **参考产品：** 13英寸iPad Air（M系列处理器）售价799美元；iPad mini（A17 Pro）起售价499美元；沃尔玛曾以599美元销售旧款M1 MacBook。
    *   **可能区间：** 综合现有产品线，价格可能介于499美元到799美元之间。
items.shortSummary: 苹果计划于2026年推出一款搭载A18 Pro芯片的低成本MacBook，旨在以低于1000美元的价格与Chromebook竞争。该设备预计配备约13英寸标准LCD显示屏，支持Apple Intelligence，提供8GB RAM，性能足以应对日常任务。它将运行macOS，续航表现出色，并可能提供多种颜色选择。预计价格在499至799美元之间，发布时间可能在2026年上半年。
items.content:
Apple is going to release a low-cost MacBook in 2026, with the device set to be more affordable than the $999 MacBook Air. With the affordable notebook, Apple is aiming to better compete with cheap Chromebooks and Windows PCs.


If you're thinking about picking up a computer for lightweight tasks like document editing, web browsing, watching videos, and doing homework, you might want to wait to see what Apple has in store before making a purchase. Below, we highlight what we know about the new Mac so far.

Size


Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo believes the low-cost MacBook will have a display that's around 13 inches in size. The ‌MacBook Air‌ has a 13.6-inch display, so the more affordable MacBook could be slightly smaller. It's sounding like it won't be too far off from the 13-inch ‌MacBook Air‌, though.

There are no details on how thick it might be, but Apple probably won't prioritize a thin design for a machine optimized for a low price. Since the ‌MacBook Air‌ can run fine with an M-series chip and no fan in an enclosure that's 0.44 inches thick, there's no reason for the MacBook to be any thicker than that.

Design and Display


The low-cost MacBook will have a standard LCD display with no mini-LED technology or ProMotion refresh rate. It could come in bright colors like the iMac, with Kuo suggesting Apple will offer it in silver, blue, pink, and yellow.

A-Series Chip


Apple is planning to use its A18 Pro chip in the MacBook. We first saw the A18 Pro in the iPhone 16 Pro models. The chip is built on Apple's second-generation 3-nanometer process, featuring 8GB RAM and support for Apple Intelligence.

It's fast and efficient, and more than capable of handling day-to-day tasks. In Geekbench 6 benchmarks, the A18 Pro offers single-core CPU performance scores at the level of the M3 Ultra, and multi-core performance scores higher than the M1 chip that Apple used in the first Apple silicon ‌MacBook Air‌. Metal scores that measure GPU performance are also similar to the ‌M1‌ chip Metal scores.

The A18 Pro will be equivalent to the ‌M1‌ for some tasks, and faster for other tasks. Apple no longer sells the ‌M1‌ ‌MacBook Air‌ from its own store, but it has offered the machine through Walmart at a $599 price point.

Capabilities


With the A18 Pro chip, the low-cost MacBook would be able to do anything that can be done on an ‌iPhone 16‌ Pro. It would be a suitable replacement for the low-cost iPad paired with a keyboard, and it would also support ‌Apple Intelligence‌ features.

Right now, an ‌iPad‌ is essentially the only option for a low-cost portable device that can serve as a computer, but the low-cost MacBook will add a solution that runs macOS instead of iPadOS.

Tasks like browsing the web, watching videos, creating documents, editing photos, and even light video editing would be no problem. A low-cost MacBook with A18 Pro chip could play all of Apple's ‌iPad‌ and iPhone games, including Apple Arcade titles, but it would not work well with high-end system intensive games.

It would also run apps like Final Cut Pro, but speeds for things like exporting video would not be as quick as with a more powerful Mac.

Apple probably won't go all out on ports, and the MacBook is likely to get just a single USB-C port, though two like the ‌MacBook Air‌ is also possible.

The A18 Pro chip is efficient, and there's a lot of space inside a 13-inch enclosure for a battery, so we could be looking at MacBook Air-level battery life or better. The ‌MacBook Air‌'s battery lasts for up to 18 hours when watching videos, or 15 hours when browsing the web.

Price


There are no specific details on price as of yet, but Bloomberg claims it will cost "well under $1,000." The ‌MacBook Air‌ is priced starting at $999, so it would need to come in under that.

Apple has a 13-inch iPad Air that has a display in the same range rumored for the low-cost MacBook, and it's priced at $799. The ‌iPad Air‌ has a higher-end M-series processor though, so the low-cost MacBook could be less than the ‌iPad Air‌.

The closest ‌iPad‌ approximation for the chip is the iPad mini, which has an A17 Pro. The ‌iPad mini‌ is priced starting at $499. A price somewhere between $499 and $799 could make sense looking at Apple's existing product lineup. The older ‌M1‌ MacBook that sells for $599 at Walmart also gives us a hint at what Apple might charge.

Launch Timing


Apple could launch the low-cost MacBook in the first half of 2026. Updates are planned for the ‌MacBook Air‌ in early 2026, so the low-cost model could launch sometime in that same timeframe.

For more information on Apple's budget MacBook, we have a dedicated guide.

items.title: iPhone电池深度实验：慢充与快充对比 (原标题: In-Depth iPhone Battery Experiment Pits Slow Charging Against Fast Charging)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### iPhone电池深度实验：慢充与快充对比

HTX Studio进行了一项为期六个月的电池测试，旨在比较快充和慢充对iPhone电池寿命的长期影响。

**实验设计：**
*   **设备：** 使用了六部iPhone 12手机。
*   **充电循环：** 建立了一个系统，反复将电池从5%耗尽并充电至100%。
    *   其中三部手机进行快充。
    *   另外三部手机进行慢充。
*   **充电范围测试：** 另一组iPhone进行了相同的测试，但充电始终在30%到80%之间进行。
*   **容量检测：** 实验前后（500次循环后）均对每部手机的电池容量进行了测试。

**实验结果：**
*   **快充影响：** 结果表明，快充导致的额外电池损耗微乎其微。
*   **充电范围影响：** 将iPhone电量保持在30%到80%之间，可能会带来微小的益处。

**HTX Studio的结论：**
*   充电的最佳方式是“随你喜欢”，无需过度思考，也不必为了微不足道的电池寿命而耗费精力。
*   该视频还包含了Android手机的测试结果，对于那些对快充影响感到好奇的人来说，非常值得完整观看。
items.shortSummary: HTX Studio一项为期六个月的iPhone电池实验显示，快充对电池寿命的额外损耗微乎其微。将电量保持在30%至80%之间可能略有益处。研究结论是，用户无需过度担忧充电方式，可“随心所欲”地充电。
items.translated_title: iPhone电池深度实验：慢充与快充对比
items.content:
HTX Studio this week shared the results from a six-month battery test that compared how fast charging and slow charging can affect battery life over time.


Using six iPhone 12 models, the channel set up a system to drain the batteries from five percent and charge them to 100 percent over and over again. Three were fast charged, and three were slow charged.

Another set of iPhones underwent the same test, but with charging initiated at 30 percent and stopped at 80 percent, so the iPhones were always in that range.

Prior to the experiment, the capacity for each phone was tested, and after 500 cycles, the capacity was tested again. The results suggest there is minimal additional battery drain from fast charging, but keeping an ‌iPhone‌ between 30 and 80 percent charge could be minimally beneficial.

HTX Studio concluded that the best way to charge an ‌iPhone‌ is "however you like," without overthinking it and trading mental energy for a tiny bit of battery life. The same video also includes Android tests, and is well worth watching in full for those curious about the effects of fast charging.

items.title: tvOS 26.2 允许无需账户创建 Apple TV 个人资料，并新增专用儿童模式 (原标题: tvOS 26.2 Lets You Create Apple TV Profiles Without an Account, Adds Dedicated Kids Mode)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## tvOS 26.2 更新：无需账户的个人资料与专用儿童模式

Apple 在 tvOS 26.2 中对 Apple TV 的个人资料功能进行了重大改进，主要亮点是允许用户无需 Apple 账户即可创建个人资料，并引入了更完善的专用儿童模式。

### 无需账户创建个人资料

*   **简化流程**：现在，在 Apple TV 的“设置”应用中的个人资料部分，“添加新个人资料”选项不再强制要求用户使用 Apple 设备登录或手动输入 Apple 账户信息。
*   **“创建个人资料”选项**：除了 Apple 账户登录选项外，新增了一个“创建个人资料”选项，用户只需提供姓名、个人资料评级，并回答一个关于新用户是否为儿童的简单问题即可。
    ![tvos 26 2 create profile](https://images.macrumors.com/t/F2Zxog5vuMC_aDFXgFZqtOcMU-8=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/tvos-26-2-create-profile.jpg?lossy)
*   **适用场景**：此功能对于创建访客个人资料和儿童个人资料尤其有用，提升了使用的灵活性。

### 专用儿童模式

*   **内容限制**：如果选择新用户为儿童，系统默认会将内容限制为 PG 评级。用户还可以通过自定义选项进行更精细的控制，根据儿童年龄选择适合的电视节目和电影评级。
    ![tvos 26 2 kids profile](https://images.macrumors.com/t/suo77mEjaqS56TCUa7Lka7cYx9I=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/tvos-26-2-kids-profile.jpg?lossy)
    ![tvos 26 2 kids profile customization](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9oAJKRxZJJf7QquU2v46u4p6R7g=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/tvos-26-2-kids-profile-customization.jpg?lossy)
*   **Apple TV 应用体验**：创建儿童账户并设置评级后，Apple TV 应用将只显示符合设定的内容限制的节目。当儿童个人资料登录时，Apple TV 应用（包括商店和资料库部分）将不会显示任何成人内容，仅提供儿童节目和电影。
    ![tvos 26 2 kids apple tv app](https://images.macrumors.com/t/lVWHDsdkE9S4ibEUZ-ZQjwVMD4k=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/tvos-26-2-kids-apple-tv-app.jpg?lossy)
*   **历史与现状**：多年前曾有关于 Apple TV 专用儿童模式的传闻，但未能实现。tvOS 26.2 中的这些改变是 Apple 迄今为止最接近为儿童提供专属 Apple TV 体验的尝试。
*   **局限性**：需要注意的是，儿童个人资料的限制仅适用于 Apple TV 应用。其他所有应用仍然可见和可访问，并且任何应用都可以从 App Store 下载。因此，对于 Apple TV 应用之外的内容，仍需使用家长控制功能来限制访问。

### 其他重要信息

*   **成人个人资料**：家中没有 Apple 账户的成年人现在也可以创建自己的个人资料，享受不受限制的内容访问和个性化推荐。
*   **账户管理**：任何无需 Apple 账户创建的个人资料都可以随时删除，或在之后升级以添加 Apple 账户。
*   **跨设备兼容性**：tvOS 26.2 中的个人资料可能会在某些支持 Apple TV 应用的第三方设备（如智能电视）上显示。
*   **发布状态**：tvOS 26.2 目前已面向开发者和公共测试人员开放，预计将于 12 月中旬左右正式发布。
items.shortSummary: tvOS 26.2 更新允许用户无需 Apple 账户即可创建 Apple TV 个人资料，方便访客和儿童使用。新版本引入了专用儿童模式，儿童个人资料登录时，Apple TV 应用将自动过滤并仅显示适合年龄的内容。用户可自定义内容评级限制。此功能仅限于 Apple TV 应用，其他应用仍需家长控制。该版本目前处于测试阶段，预计12月中旬发布。
items.translated_title: tvOS 26.2 允许无需账户创建 Apple TV 个人资料，并新增专用儿童模式
items.content:
With tvOS 26.2, Apple is changing the way that profiles work on the Apple TV. It's now possible to create a profile without an Apple Account, which is particularly useful for guest profiles and profiles for children.


In the ‌Apple TV‌ Settings app's profiles section, the "Add New Profile" option no longer requests that users sign in with an Apple device or manually with an Apple Account.

Alongside the Apple Account sign in, there is a "Create Profile" option that only requires a name, a profile rating, and a yes or no question about whether the new user is a child.


Selecting yes limits content to a PG rating by default, but there is a customize option for more granular control. Users can select ratings for TV shows and movies that are appropriate for the child based on their age. All of the standard TV show and movie ratings are available to select. Creating a child account and choosing a rating changes the ‌Apple TV‌ content that is available to the child. The ‌Apple TV‌ app will only show content that is appropriate for the limits that have been established for the account.


In tvOS 26.1, the latest public version of tvOS, profiles require an Apple Account. The TV app has a dedicated children's section and parents can set up parental controls to limit access, but it is not the full kids-only ‌Apple TV‌ view that's in tvOS 26.2.


The ‌Apple TV‌ app in tvOS 26.2 does not show any adult content when a child's profile is signed in, including in the Store and Library sections of the app. Only kids shows and movies are available to watch or purchase.

Years ago prior to the launch of tvOS 14, there were rumors of a dedicated kids mode for the ‌Apple TV‌, but that didn't materialize. The changes in tvOS 26.2 are the closest Apple has come to an ‌Apple TV‌ experience just for children.

When a kids profile is active, it only applies to the ‌Apple TV‌ app. All other apps are visible and accessible to the user, and any app can be downloaded from the App Store. Parental controls still need to be used to limit access to content outside of the ‌Apple TV‌ app.

Setting up an adult profile allows for unrestricted access to the content on the ‌Apple TV‌, so adults in the home that don't have an Apple Account can also now have their own profiles with their own content recommendations. Any account that is created without an Apple Account can be deleted or can be upgraded to add an Apple Account at a later time.

Profiles on tvOS 26.2 say that they may also show up on certain third-party devices, so accounts for children may also be accessible on devices with the ‌Apple TV‌ app, like smart TVs.

tvOS 26.2 is available for developers and public beta testers at the current time, and it is expected to launch sometime around the middle of December.

items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### 苹果发布首个 macOS Tahoe 26.2 公测版

苹果于2025年11月7日星期五向公众测试人员发布了即将推出的 macOS Tahoe 26.2 更新的首个公测版，比开发者测试版晚一天。

![macOS Tahoe 26 Thumb 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/T2BSufJAVQ9E_IK-OtVY1MXCiVI=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/macOS-Tahoe-26-Thumb-2.jpg?lossy)

**主要更新内容：**

*   **获取方式：** 公测版测试人员可在苹果测试网站注册后，通过“系统设置”应用中的“软件更新”部分下载此更新。
*   **新功能：**
    *   “提醒事项”应用新增了在提醒到期时发出警报的选项。
    *   “新闻”应用进行了一些设计更新。
    *   “播客”应用增加了新功能。
*   **发布时间：** 此次测试期预计不会很长，根据以往的发布时间线，苹果很可能在12月中旬左右发布 macOS Tahoe 26.2 正式版。

**相关热门新闻：**

文章还提到了近期其他一些苹果相关的重要新闻：

*   **苹果调整折抵换购价值：** 苹果更新了部分 iPhone、iPad、Mac 和 Apple Watch 型号的折抵换购价值。大多数设备的最高价值有所下降或保持不变，但 iPad Air 略有提升。
*   **苹果新 Siri 将由 Google Gemini 提供支持：** 彭博社报道称，苹果正在开发更智能、更强大的 Siri 版本，将由 Google Gemini 提供支持。苹果每年将向 Google 支付约10亿美元，以使用其1.2万亿参数的人工智能模型。
*   **iOS 26.1 已发布，包含8项新功能：** 经过一个多月的测试，苹果于11月3日星期一发布了 iOS 26.1。此更新包含多项新功能和更改，包括调整“液态玻璃”（Liquid Glass）外观的选项。
*   **苹果分享“液态玻璃”设计画廊：** 苹果正在推广 iOS 26 中的新“液态玻璃”设计，展示第三方开发者如何在他们的应用中采用这种美学。
*   **苹果官网 AirTag 四件装价格异常低：** 苹果美国在线商店突然以29美元的价格出售四件装 AirTag，这与单个 AirTag 的价格相同，很可能是一个定价错误。
*   **苹果将在欧盟地区 iOS 26.2 中移除 iPhone-Apple Watch Wi-Fi 同步：** 一份新报告显示，为遵守欧盟法规，苹果将在 iOS 26.2 中禁用 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 之间自动 Wi-Fi 网络同步功能。
*   **宜家推出21款 HomeKit 兼容智能灯泡、传感器和控制器：** 宜家宣布即将推出21款新的 Matter 兼容智能家居产品，这些产品将能够与 HomeKit 和苹果家庭应用连接。
*   **苹果2026年智能家居改造计划：** 苹果的 HomeKit 智能家居平台已推出十多年，急需更新。苹果计划在2026年进行智能家居改造，包括开发一个家庭中枢或“指挥中心”。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已发布首个 macOS Tahoe 26.2 公测版，供公众测试人员下载。此更新包含“提醒事项”应用警报选项、“新闻”应用设计更新和“播客”应用新功能。预计正式版将在12月中旬发布。文章还提及了苹果调整折抵换购价值、新 Siri 将由 Google Gemini 驱动、iOS 26.1 发布及欧盟地区 iPhone-Apple Watch Wi-Fi 同步移除等近期热门新闻。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布首个 macOS Tahoe 26.2 公测版
items.content:
Apple today provided public beta testers with the first release of an upcoming macOS Tahoe 26.2 update for testing purposes. The public beta comes a day after Apple provided the beta to developers.


After signing up for beta testing on Apple's beta site, public beta testers can download the updates using the Software Update section in the System Settings app.

The Reminders app includes an option to have an alarm go off when a reminder is due, the News app has some design updates, and Apple is adding new features to the Podcasts app.

The beta is limited to developers and public beta testers right now, but it won't be a long testing period. We'll likely see Apple release macOS Tahoe 26.2 right around mid-December given past launch timelines.
